attribute.description: The attribute of the DynamoDB table

billing_mode.description: The billing mode of the DynamoDB table

global_secondary_index.description: A list of maps representing the global secondary indexes
global_secondary_index.type: list(object({ name: string, hash_key: string, range_key: string, projection_type: string, read_capacity: number, write_capacity: number }))

hash_key.description: The hash key of the DynamoDB table

local_secondary_index.description: A list of maps representing the local secondary indexes
local_secondary_index.type: list(object({ name: string, range_key : string, projection_type: string}))

range_key.description: The range key of the DynamoDB table

server_side_encryption.description: Encryption at rest options. AWS DynamoDB tables are automatically encrypted at rest with an AWS-owned Customer Master Key if this argument isn't specified.

stream_enabled.description: Indicates whether Streams is to be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

stream_view_type.description: Indicates the DynamoDB Streams settings for the table

name.description: The name of the DynamoDB table

tags.description: A map of tags to apply to the resources

ttl.description: A map representing the TTL settings

write_capacity.description: Number of write units for this table. If the billing_mode is PROVISIONED, this field is required.

read_capacity.description: Number of read units for this table. If the billing_mode is PROVISIONED, this field is required.

timeouts.type: object({create: optional(string), update: optional(string), delete: optional(string)})
timeouts.description: The timeouts for create, update and delete operations
